summary: Comprehensive testing of Long Videos feature - YouTube links, thumbnails, and Admin Dashboard. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: extractYouTubeId function correctly handles multiple URL formats (youtube.com/watch?v=, youtu.be/, embed URLs)
getThumbnail function properly falls back to YouTube auto-thumbnail when custom thumbnail_url is empty
Admin Dashboard Long Videos tab has proper Thumbnail URL input field with helpful placeholder text
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted TEST_Custom_Thumbnail_Video for testing custom thumbnail functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: Long Videos feature fully tested. Backend API supports thumbnail_url field. Frontend correctly displays custom thumbnails when provided, falls back to YouTube auto-thumbnails otherwise. YouTube links correctly parsed from full URLs using extractYouTubeId function. Admin Dashboard has Thumbnail URL input field and Thumbnail column in table.

youtube_links.details: All YouTube links correctly formatted as youtube.com/watch?v=ID, open in new tab with target=_blank

youtube_thumbnails.details: Auto-extracted from YouTube using maxresdefault.jpg with fallback to hqdefault.jpg

admin_thumbnail_input.details: Thumbnail URL input field present in Add Long Video dialog with placeholder and helper text

admin_thumbnail_column.details: Thumbnail column displays in Long Videos table, shows 'YouTube auto' or custom thumbnail image

custom_thumbnail_save.details: Custom thumbnail_url saves correctly to database and persists

custom_thumbnail_display.details: Custom thumbnail displays on frontend when provided, YouTube auto-thumbnail used as fallback
